complexity.reasoning: Incremental approach: 8-12 stories, 2-3 weeks timeline. Creating design token foundation, standardizing 2-3 form components, migrating priority components (FinalCommentsModal, ClassManagementModal). Standard team size, moderate technical complexity. No external integrations or migrations required.

scope.architecture: Optional - simple refactoring, no major architectural changes
